source_objects.title: Human Resources
source_objects.description: Learn human resources with courses ranging from oracle human capital management to attracting, hiring and retaining the best people.

items.title: Attracting, Managing & Incentivizing the Right Human capital
items.headline: Understanding the secrets to understanding the human capital needs of your business.
objectives_summary: Understanding steps for recruitment and selection
How to develop an appropriate organizational structure fit for their businesses
How to develop a hiring plan for your business

items.title: Land a Job in Innovation: The Complete Interview Guide

visible_instructors.title: Milan Pelgrims
visible_instructors.job_title: Recruiting lead at Board Of Innovation
visible_instructors.name: Milan

items.headline: Create winning applications and nail interview rounds at companies like IDEO, Board of Innovation, Frog, Fjord, etc.
objectives_summary: Understand how recruiters select candidates
Identify the behaviours that employers expect from candidates
Create keyword-rich CVs and cover letters that stand out from the crowd

items.title: Behavioural Event Interview
items.headline: A new age interview technique
objectives_summary: Behavioural Event Interview Technique
STAR Model
Behaviourally Anchored Rating Scale (BARS)

items.title: Workplace bullying. Animated stories with descriptions.

visible_instructors.job_title: Short animated movies for anti-bullying training
visible_instructors.name: Animated
visible_instructors.title: Animated Experience

items.headline: Short animated movies about undesirable behaviours for creative group training, workshops and individual learning.
objectives_summary: Examples of various bullying and other undesired behaviours at work and a wider insight into the problem.

items.title: How Manipulation Works in Startups
items.headline: The different types of manipulation that startup founders/investors/others fall prey to - as well as how to fight them
objectives_summary: The different types of manipulation in a startup's inner workings
Specific examples of how each type of manipulation may be used by founders, employees, and/OR INVESTORS
How to protect yourself against each of these types as a startup founder, employee, investor or client

items.title: Maximizing Employee Engagement

visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning

items.headline: This course teaches you how to increase the motivation and productivity of your staff.
objectives_summary: Identify six engagement drivers that will increase motivation.
Discover three questions to help your staff feel more purposeful at work.
Recognize how to establish a motivation plan for your team.

items.title: Ensure Team Effectiveness

visible_instructors.title: Exner Education
visible_instructors.job_title: Project Management for Building and Construction
visible_instructors.name: Exner

items.headline: Learn Team effectiveness on construction projects, part of a full Diploma in Project Management
objectives_summary: Learn how to establish a team performance plan
Develop and facilitate team cohesion
Facilitate team work

items.title: Feedback & Difficult Conversations

visible_instructors.job_title: Supercharge your learning with the world's leading experts
visible_instructors.name: Expert
visible_instructors.title: Expert Academy

items.headline: How To Increase Your Confidence & Build Relationships
objectives_summary: It will equip you with both the skillset and the confidence you need to successfully manage difficult conversations.

items.title: Organizational Behaviour, HR and Leadership
items.headline: Learn the Fundamentals of Organizational Behaviour, HRM and Leadership
objectives_summary: In this course you will learn to conduct research to understand theories and principles underpinning the behaviour of people in organisations to make informed decisions about how to behave in a given circumstance

In this course you will learn to investigate and evaluate every key challenges faced by business when managing people and be able to identify and employ techniques for managing individuals, teams and organisations
In this course you will learn about the industrial relations environment in which business operates, and be able to evaluate and develop strategies that  ensure compliance

items.title: Effective Interviewing
items.headline: Become a better interviewer.
objectives_summary: Understanding and overcoming unconscious bias.
Building more effective job descriptions.
Planning smart interview questions.

items.title: Build A High Performance Workforce in Your Organization

visible_instructors.job_title: Organizational Psychologist, Author, Speaker, Learning Guru
visible_instructors.name: Katy
visible_instructors.title: Katy Caselli

items.headline: Increase the Long-Term Value  of Your Workforce and Cause a Measurable Ripple Effect to End Poor Performance
objectives_summary: Increase the long-term value and productivity of the workforce causing a measurable ripple effect to help leaders end poor performance.
Show your company a measurable increase in value, with results that will knock your leaders' socks off.
Stop leaders from using a “good gut feeling” to choose employees. Use evidence to predict high performance with structured hiring tools.

items.title: The 5 secrets of acing your next interview

visible_instructors.job_title: Expert in HR, Law and Personal Development
visible_instructors.name: Kevin
visible_instructors.title: Kevin Keenoo

items.headline: Prepare, practice and ace your interview to get the job
objectives_summary: You will understand the different types of interviews
You will understand the preparation stage of interviews
You will learn to develop effective answers to difficult interview questions and learn the  common questions to expect during an interview

items.title: Effective Human Resource Management
items.headline: Ensuring low employee turnover and high productivity in the organization
objectives_summary: Learn staffing role of human resources manager
Role of human resources management in leadership development
Importance of background checks

items.title: Managing Compensation and Benefits (HRCI-PHR/SPHR)
items.headline: Course 14 of 20 of The Human Resources Certification Program (HRCI - PHR/SPHR)
objectives_summary: Job Evaluation, Pricing, and Pay Structures
Organizational Pay Programs
Compensation Policies and Programs

items.title: Creating High-Impact Coaching and Mentoring Programs

visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo

items.headline: This course provides HR leaders with the practices & skills needed to take on the challenge of professional development.
objectives_summary: Explore the purposes of coaching and mentoring and recognize how they differ.
Identify the ways coaching and mentoring contribute to corporate performance.
Discover the best practices and actions to integrate coaching and mentoring into your organization successfully.

items.title: Professional HR Questions 2021 Practice tests
items.headline: Professional HR Questions 2021 Practice tests
objectives_summary: Professional HR Knowledge
